#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	long long n,val,i,pwr,mul,t;
	string s1,ans;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>s1>>n;
		
		val=0;pwr=0;
		for(i=s1.length()-1;i>=0;i--)
		{	
		
			s1[i]=s1[i]-'0';
			mul=pow(n,pwr);
			val=val+s1[i]*mul;
			pwr++;
		}	
		printf("%c",val);		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
